title: Naughty Knots: Light Bondage... (2013) Potter Style (multi)
description:
Naughty Knots: Light Bondage and Bedroom Tricks (2013) Potter Style (multi) 



Naughty Knots: Light Bondage and Bedroom Tricks by Potter Style


Format: mobi/epub/azw3
Length: 224 pages
Genre: Non-Fiction/Lifestyles & Relationships
Date: 31 December 2013

Learn the ropes of erotic bondage with a discreet knot-tying guide. Follow the step-by-step illustrations and discover how to restrain your partner simply and safely. You'll also learn how to fashion a suggestive rope corset, a crop for spanking, and other bedroom tricks that will have you bound for adventure!

For the millions of readers of Fifty Shades of Grey and the genre it ignited or for anyone looking for a Valentine's Day gift this illustrated gift book explores sensual knot-tying techniques with playful step-by-step illustrations. The art of seduction and the craft of knot tying meet in Naughty Knots, a small illustrated bondage guide that provides more than 30 ways to get 'knotty' in the bedroom. The book covers instructions for safely binding hands and feet, bondage methods incorporating furniture, sensual-looking decorative knots, and a classic burlesque rope routine.

Illustrated without explicit nudity, the steps are as clear as a sailor's manual, although the knots have naughty new monikers (i.e. 'The Cat's Paw' a staple for fishermen, is employed for foot bondage and renamed 'The Pussy Foot').

Publisher:

POTTER STYLE, an imprint of the Crown Publishing group, is a high-end gift book and stationery line, specializing in lifestyle, design, art, fashion, humor and DIY.
